= Introduction =

- A Integration Test Unit for Spring MVC.

Several components are checked:  controller, response from the application etc...

= Details =

{{{
HttpIntegrationConfigurationTest(port=9006, root="/test", src="src/main/resources/webapp/spring")

public class SpringMVCIntegrationTest extends AbstractSpringMVCIntegrationTest {
	
	
	public void test() {
		String uri = "http://localhost:9006/test/controller";
		assertExistBeanInDispatcherServlet("controller");
		assertExistBeanInApplicationContext("service");
		
		assertResponseStatusOK(uri);
		assertResponseContentEmpty(uri);
	}
